Package playwriter

package playwriter
Represents the PlayWriter package.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Nicolas Almerge
  • Class
    Description
    ArgumentPair
    Represents a pair of arguments.
    Character
    Represents a character.
    CharacterView
    Represents a read-only view of a character.
    Counter
    Represents a counter.
    FileParser
    Represents a file parser.
    LineParser
    Represents a line parser.
    Pair
    Represents a pair of arguments.
    Play
    Represents a play.
    PlayAction
    Represents a play action.
    PlayCompileTimeError
    Represents a play-compile time error.
    PlayEnterAction
    Represents an action where some players should enter.
    PlayEnterAllAction
    Represents an action where all players should enter.
    PlayExitAction
    Represents an action where some players should exit.
    PlayExitAllAction
    Represents an action where all players should exit.
    PlayOnStageAction
    Represents an action where some players should be on stage at the beginning of the play.
    PlayOnStageAllAction
    Represents an action where all players should be on stage at the beginning of the play.
    PlayWriter
    Represents the program's entry point.
    Utils
    Represents a collection of constants and utility functions.
